data.message: I have a new line big Sean its I'm a real princess Marshall Eminem Slim Mathers da 3rd MaRRy Me I'll make u a prince of ur own nation my nation and u can have anything on this Earth because my dad and mum are king henry & queen Geoffrey of the Seychelles islands and you can escape to my island with no paparazzi and a place that if you eat the coco der met coconut u will be immortal.*giggles* MaRRy Me I have everything & so can u Paradise everyday

replies.message: The coco der mer  coconut takes 21 yrs 2 develop & they r protected by law they have the properties of the fountain of youth which eating it makes u immortal *giggles* its a mistacle plant coming from the garden of eden where Adam and Eve were born.*giggles* I'm a 2 in 1 package deal I'm a mother princess & my daughter just turned 18 today which means she's now treated like a adult in  Oz and she's the beginning and I'm the end of the omega.
